attributes.action: STOP THIS WAR NOW. We have no business bombing Iraq and Syria
attributes.additional_details:
We did not elect this government to bomb other countries. We do NOT  give them permission to start a third Iraq war. War is pointless, devastating, expensive and solves nothing. This war cannot be won and will cost money and lives while achieving nothing.
We want the Government to stop all military and aggressive action immediately .

rejection.details:
Please see petition below:

Petition Title: The UK Invading Syria / The East

Created by: Colin Hardy

Closing: 30/03/2015
